usage.eng: Can you give us an additional 200 cases?

usage.cn: 相信上天的旨意，发生在这世界上的事情没有一样是出于偶然，终有一天这一切都会有一个解释。
usage.eng: Everything will have an explanation one day.

usage.cn: 一跟你讲话，我就会笑得跟个白痴似的
usage.eng: I smile like an idiot when I'm talking to you.

usage.cn: 我喜欢偶尔出差一次，来点改变。
usage.eng: I like to take an occasional business trip for a change.
